name: Gloop (MiguelCPereira)
description:
Oh no!!

Beauregard, the skater-bear, has lost his music collection! Take control of his friend, a little slime called Gloop, and help him out in this fun and laid-back puzzle-platformer.

Split, merge and shapeshift as you go through your tape-finding journey!

This project was developed by:

Miguel Pereira - Programmer

Perry Wubben - Animator and Rigger

Alex Moldovan - Character and UI Artist

Kenneth Tan - Environment and Shader Artist

Vital Van Hollebeke - Level and Game Designer

Watse D'Haene - Sound Designer

Nicolas Moreau - Music Composer
